duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure a positive shopping experience for customers, greeting and assisting them in a courteous manner.
Maintain a clean and organized work area, and ensure proper merchandise presentation.
Assist customers with merchandise, answer their questions, and provide prompt and efficient responses at all times.
Perform cleaning tasks and maintain a professional appearance according to the company's dress code.
Expedite newly received merchandise to the sales floor, ensuring it is merchandised to standards and maintaining merchandise familiarity within departments.
Demonstrate integrity and honesty in all interactions with associates and customers, safeguarding confidential information, cash, and merchandise.
Follow all policies and procedures concerning cash, check, charge card, and refund transactions, ensuring accuracy and awareness when handling tenders.
Maximize productivity by executing all store best practices and minimizing steps and touches in the work flow.
